metadata.title: CVE-2016-6298 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
The _Rsa15 class in the RSA 1.5 algorithm implementation in jwa.py in jwcrypto before 0.3.2 lacks the Random Filling protection mechanism, which makes it easier for remote attackers to obtain cleartext data via a Million Message Attack (MMA).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6298` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-jwcrypto - 0.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-jwcrypto package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.2-1').
